description: Listen to BBC local radio from Sunday's rugby league action in the Super League, Championship and League One.
title: Sunday's rugby league
maintext:
Team news
Salford Red Devils v Leeds Rhinos (15:00 BST)
Victory for Salford or Leeds would close the gap to Super League leaders Castleford to eight points.
Both sides missed out on last season's top eight, going through the Qualifiers to secure their Super League status.
Leeds Rhinos welcome back skipper Danny McGuire and experienced back-rower Jamie Jones-Buchanan, with Rob Burrow and Brett Ferres both injured.
Salford's Jake Bibby, Dan Murray and Josh Wood come in for Todd Carney, Mark Flanagan and Logan Tomkins.
Red Devils centre Junior Sa'u could make his 100th appearance for the club if selected by head coach Ian Watson.
